name: Surfent Terra
description: Its aerodynamic form is well suited to life on the sand. Poachers often catch them and use them in place of surfboards

skills.name: Sand Blast
skills.description: Hurls sticky mud at an enemy.

skills.name: Dragon Cannon
skills.description: Hurls an energy ball imbued with draconic energy at an enemy.

skills.name: Stone Blast
skills.description: Fires a barrage of stones forward.

skills.name: Stone Cannon
skills.description: Digs up a boulder and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: Sand Tornado
skills.description: Generates two sand tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: Draconic Breath
skills.description: Exhales breath imbued with draconic energy, dealing continuous damage to those in front of it.

skills.name: Rock Lance
skills.description: Generates a sharp rock spear under an enemy.
